name: Radical Penguin
description:
Armed with a rocket launcher, you, the penguin Captain CHIEP, play a hero who wants to protect the South Pole - lots of BOOM BOOM and fun!

A game of the SAE Institute Hamburg Game Jam November 2018.

Story:
Once upon a time at the South Pole...

On a Friday, our hero Captain CHIEP looked up and saw the threat for the first time: The power-hungry polar bears from the North Pole had come to conquer the South Pole!

But they had not expected Captain CHIEP...
